channel.title: Tools on code(evening);
channel.description: Recent content in Tools on code(evening);

item.title: Configure remote development environment using VS Code
item.description: #VSCode During kernel development, the process from build to test to debugging is quite cumbersome. For this reason, we saw that QEMU and gdb were linked to build a development environment. I don’t know if it’s comparable to that, but there were some difficulties in development related to the Linux graphics stack. It was only later that I realized it was good for my mental health that it was better to set up a development environment in the first place, even if it bothered me.
